author: atlas.sui
content: Is there a channel for discussing the general issues plaguing L2 solutions and their adoption?

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't think there is an L2 specific channel in here.

author: sky.cactus
content: I think all channels here are L1 specific?

author: atlas.sui
content: Strange, considering how often L2 and zkrollups are being parroted as a mitigation/scaling "solution"

author: sky.cactus
content: Each project working on rollups have their own discord server where discussion happens.

author: atlas.sui
content:
Yeah, I've joined a specific one but am more interested in a general conversation about the currently limited use cases (sending small amounts of tokens is comparatively the only viable use case) 

However discussing the shortcomings of L2 as a solution there just looks like FUD...

author: madeof_tin7509
content: The difficulty bomb needs a fork either way. Sometime near July a fork will need to address it.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: Things that are also ready around that time will make it into the same fork.

author: sky.cactus
content: I can see value in having an L2 channel in this server, maybe suggest it to the mods and see if they like it?  Definitely seems appropriate for this server as that is a big part of Ethereum's scaling plans.
